alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:55AM CDT until July 11 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WASHITA...NORTHWESTERN GRADY...NORTHERN CADDO... SOUTH CENTRAL BLAINE AND CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 255 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of El Reno to 5 miles east of Cogar to 6 miles north of Lake Chickasha, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... El Reno, Yukon, Piedmont, Hinton, Union City, Minco, Geary, Hydro, Binger, Calumet, Eakly, Lookeba, Colony, Bridgeport, Cogar, Concho, Cedar Lake, and Richland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
